hero.headline: Together, we clean the oceans. With radical transparency.
hero.subheadline: The first community and open-source platform that connects technology and people to fund real ocean cleanup actions.

problem.title: The Problem That Already Impacts 100% of Life on Earth
problem.subtitle: Plastic, garbage and oil have already reached everywhere: in the sea, in the air, in the rain, in our blood and even in the human placenta.
problem.animals_dead: visible animals die every year from plastic and oil

stat1.title: Marine Animals
stat1.desc: Turtles, birds, marine mammals and fish die victims of plastic and oil annually.

stat2.title: Human Beings
stat2.desc: Everyone on the planet already carries microplastics in their body, including in their blood.

stat3.title: Microorganisms
stat3.desc: Essential microorganisms for marine balance are being contaminated and extinct.

stat4.title: Ocean Plastic
stat4.desc: Amount of plastic dumped into the oceans annually, equivalent to one truck per minute.

stat5.title: Land Pollution
stat5.desc: Of marine pollution comes from untreated terrestrial waste.

stat6.title: Food Chain
stat6.desc: The entire food chain is contaminated, from plankton to large predators.

problem.urgent_title: There's no more time to waste
problem.urgent_text: Every day that passes, more lives are lost. Oceans are responsible for 70% of the oxygen we breathe. Without healthy oceans, there is no life on Earth.

solution.title: Bluezz Attacks Evil at the Root
solution.subtitle: Monitor oil spills and plastic waste in real time. Mobilize the global community to fund transparent and audited cleanup missions.

tech.title: Real-Time Monitoring
tech.desc: Advanced technology to detect and track ocean pollution 24/7.
tech.f1: AI detects oil spills and plastic concentrations
tech.f2: Satellites and drones map critical areas

governance.title: Community Mobilization
governance.desc: Decision power in the hands of those who care about the oceans.

transparency.title: 100% Auditable and Transparent
transparency.desc: Every cent tracked, every action documented, everything public.

impact.title: The Impact We Want to Generate
impact.text: Every action at Bluezz is a direct attack on the biggest silent enemy of life. We're not talking about 'saving little fish': we're talking about ensuring oxygen, food and health for all species, including humans.

howItWorks.title: HOW IT WORKS
howItWorks.subtitle: From Problem to Solution in 5 Steps
howItWorks.description: Intelligent system that transforms indignation into concrete action. Every step is transparent, auditable and controlled by the community.

1.title: Intelligent Detection
1.desc: AI and satellites identify pollution in real time

2.title: Instant Mobilization
2.desc: Community is alerted and missions are proposed

5.title: Total Transparency
5.desc: Auditable and public results in real time

cta.title: Ready to Be Part of the Change?
cta.text: Join thousands of people who are already transforming ocean health. Every action counts, every support matters.

differentials.title: Why Bluezz Is the Revolution
differentials.subtitle: Radical transparency, community governance and cutting-edge technology. Compared to the traditional model, we are the future.
differentials.comparison_subtitle: The difference is in the details - and in the results

row1.label: Donation Tracking
row1.ongs: Annual generic reports, no usage details
row1.bluezz: Blockchain + Public dashboard in real time

row2.label: Decision Making
row2.bluezz: Community votes on all missions and actions

row3.label: Technology
row3.bluezz: 100% open source on GitHub, auditable by everyone

row4.label: Speed
row4.ongs: Months to approve and execute projects

row5.label: Accountability
row5.bluezz: Photo evidence + GPS + blockchain for every action

cta.title: No More Empty Promises
cta.text: With Bluezz, every dollar donated becomes verifiable action. Join the environmental transparency revolution.

manifesto.title: Our Constitution Is the Community
manifesto.excerpt: We're tired of donating in the dark. Tired of trusting without verifying. Bluezz was born to return power to the people who care about the oceans.

principle1.title: Impact First
principle1.desc: Every decision is guided by real impact on the oceans, not by politics or profit.

principle2.title: Community Power
principle2.desc: The community decides. No hierarchy, no bureaucracy. Direct vote on everything.

principle3.title: Radical Transparency
principle3.desc: Open code, open accounts, open decisions. Nothing hidden, ever.

principle4.title: Democratic Governance
principle4.desc: One supporter, one vote. All changes go through public voting.

nonprofit.title: Non-Profit Social Project
nonprofit.text: Bluezz is a social project with no profit motive. Not a single cent is moved without approval from community governance. Every transaction is public, every decision is voted on, every action is audited.

manifesto.quote: "Evil is already global. Impact is already total. The solution needs to be collective."

funds.title: Available funds
funds.caption: Example values for demonstration. Coming soon: real-time data.

repo.title: Follow on GitHub
repo.desc: Code, issues, votes and audits open for anyone to verify.

companies.title: NGOs and Companies
companies.desc: See approved organizations and those in the voting process.

community.title: We Are Thousands United for the Oceans
community.subtitle: A global community of people who no longer accept empty promises. Together, we transform indignation into concrete action.

testimonial1.quote: Finally a platform where I can see exactly where my donation goes. Bluezz's transparency is revolutionary!

testimonial2.quote: Participating in votes and seeing my voice heard in decisions is incredible. This is how it should work!

testimonial3.quote: Open source gave me total confidence. I can audit everything, from code to transactions. This is the future!

join.title: Be Part of the Change
join.text: Join our community and actively participate in decisions. Your voice matters, your vote counts, your action transforms.

community.final_cta: Evil is already global. The solution needs to be collective.

1.quote: Finally a way to fund ocean cleanup with real transparency.
1.author: Marina

2.quote: I love being able to see where every cent goes and vote on projects.
2.author: Lucas

3.quote: Open-source from the beginning. This is the way.
3.author: Ana

cta.title: Join the first wave
cta.subtitle: Help decide who cleans our ocean today.

howToHelp.title: How to Help
howToHelp.subtitle: There are several ways to contribute to the preservation of our oceans. Discover how you can be part of this important mission.

contribute.title: Contribute Financially
contribute.description: Make donations to ocean cleanup projects and marine pollution control
features: 100% of the amount goes to the project

share.title: Share on Social Media
share.description: Amplify the reach of projects by sharing with your network

ambassador.title: Become an Ambassador
ambassador.description: Become a spokesperson for the cause in your community

volunteer.title: Volunteering
volunteer.description: Donate your time and skills to directly support projects

cta.title: Still have questions about how to help?
cta.subtitle: Our team is ready to guide you on the best way to contribute

discover.title: Discover Projects
discover.subtitle: Explore marine preservation projects that need your help. Every contribution makes a difference for a cleaner ocean.
discover.noProjects: No projects found with the applied filters.

cta.title: Didn't find what you're looking for?
cta.subtitle: New projects are added regularly. Sign up to receive notifications.

howItWorks.headline: From Detection to Action: The Community Decides, the Ocean Revives.
howItWorks.subheadline: Bluezz connects technology and community governance to clean the oceans with radical transparency. Here, you don't just donate‚Äîyou decide.

1.title: 1. AI-Powered Detection
1.description: Our artificial intelligence monitors the oceans 24/7, identifying large plastic clusters and oil spills with high precision.

2.title: 2. Public & Community Tender
2.description: Once a problem is identified, we open a public tender on the platform. Companies and organizations apply to perform the cleanup, submitting their plans and budgets.

3.title: 3. Voting & Crowdfunding
3.description: The Bluezz community funds the operation and votes for the project they deem most efficient and trustworthy. Every dollar donated is a vote.

4.title: 4. Transparent Execution & Real-Time Auditing
4.description: Goal reached? The funds are transferred to the executor on the same day. The entire process is auditable, with real-time updates and reports.

5.title: 5. Open-Source Governance
5.description: Bluezz is yours. All our rules, finances, and code are open and auditable on GitHub. The community governs.

cta.title: Join the First Wave
cta.subtitle: Your vote decides who will clean our ocean. Join community governance today.
